My Face

summary: Oh that one’s easy! As soon as this boy walked up to the classroom with his big chompers and that glare of an insane person, I...
caption:
Oh that one’s easy! As soon as this boy walked up to the classroom with his big chompers and that glare of an insane person, I was like Ok Hello Yes Who Is She??? And BOY was I not dissappointed. 

His design was everything I wanted in a character. But! It didn’t stop there! When I heard his name was TetsuTetsu TetsuTetsu I was like This is it this is t he perfect- but I didn’t even have TIME to finish that thought because they smacked me in the face with him having the sweetest goddamn personality. Like, he sorta looks like the angry bully kind of character?? Sorta like a Kacchan but more brutish?? But no. He’s just as sweet and intense as Kirishima! But looks like a crazy person! Fucking SOLD!!! Characters that look big and scary but are actually sweethearts is like my number one weakness next to sharp teeth… There is NOTHING to critique about Tetsu, he is the ultimate being.

Anyway I love Tetsu with all my heart he is the best no joke like I had no time to breathe during his introduction because they just kept giving me reasons to adore him. Don’t talk to me about him unless you want me to gush forever.

blog.name: jynnbean2018
blog.title: 💮💖💮 I will do the things that I want to do!
blog.description:
Hmm I pretty much just like anything!~ First off I'm 27 years old so if you want to know how old I am you can read my intro. ~~~ I'm an optimistic and cynical person when I want to be but over all I am an enthusiastic person! I like to support people and help out as much as I can! I also like to play along in Role Play and Cosplay~! I don't don't believe in YOLO but I do want to have a happy, fun life and not waste it on people who are trying to do more harm then good for me just because they can't get over shit.
I do not like to pity people because it is a waste of time. People say 'Do not pity me' usually wants to be pitied so they can take advantage of your kindness and I should know because it happened to me. So don't ever pity or feel sorry for someone just offer your help but don't do everything for them or you will waste a lot of time.
Basically "Teach a man how to fish and grow crops and he will never grow hungry but if you give a man fish and crops he expect that from you forever and use you until you have nothing because he stole your damn wallet!" 
If I like something a lot I might just draw it. If I read something and like it a lot I might just turn it into a comic/manga. But that is if I like it and if you are willing to help out with details so I can put it in drawing.
Precious life lessons. So many to share!
Another thing about me is that I like to 'like' a lot of stuff. If I can go back in time to the first thing you post I would like it! I'm not trying to spam you I just 'like' things. It's alright to like things but if I am spamming you to much please feel free to tell me and I'll stop. I know what I like and how I like it because in reality I'm a real bitch in real life so feel honoured that I liked your stuff because I will point out any mistakes you make(if I see any mistakes). I'm not perfect myself but I try and do my best to self improve and I can help you to if you like! and if I make a mistake with my drawing PLEASE tell me I want to get better at my own skills. Drawing helps me relax.

summary: Now I am finished with Setsuno! I paired him up with Meowth because I remember back in day that Meowth fell in love with another...
body:
Now I am finished with Setsuno! I paired him up with Meowth because I remember back in day that Meowth fell in love with another Meowth but she only liked humans so Meowth went out of his way to be more human like for her by learning to talk, read, and walk like a human. But instead of falling in love with Meowth she told him he was a freak and he felt outlasted by the rest of his pokemon friends because of his Plus Ultra change! He joined team rocket because he had no where else to go. And when team rocket didn’t work out Meowth was accidentally transported into another world! The world of Plus Ultra!!! And he meet Setsuno Toya and they became best friends! Toya always thought Pokemons were just cartoon characters.

But this is the world of MHA so I am going to make my own fanon that the creator of the Animation Industry has a quirk that let’s him/her see through another dimension or dimensions but he only can see through a limited amount of places that he can link up to so he gets other people who want to be cartoonist who want to make cartoons or animes together and links up their minds so he can see if that person can link up to different worlds so they can get ideas to make cartoons or animes.

Think of Ice King from Adventure Time when he feel asleep and a beam went into his head/crown and sent images and videos of Fiona and Cake Adventures in his dreams.

Or think of The Green Lantern when they get sent to a comic book that was cancelled because the creator ran out of ideas. But it turned out that the comic was very much a real place but just in a different world completely and the reason why the the comic creator didn’t finish is because the link that connected to the “comic” world had died from a Nuclear War. This is a real show I will post it up for you if anyone wants to see it.

That’s basically how the Animation Industry makes its cartoons and animes and gets all their ideas.

Sailor moon, Steven Universe, Pokemon all that is real in a different world but no one really knows until a person with a similar quirk like the Animation Industry Creator starts using his quirk and accidentally pulling things out of different worlds and dimensions.

That is how Meowth was able to go to MHA world. If anyone need an explanation.

How Meowth and Setsuno Toya meet is a surprise!

@chickaddeart Ta~da!

summary:
Shigaraki: This new haircut had better look good.
Toga: You’ll love it. It’s kind of a new wave.
Shigaraki: New wave? Like...
body:
Shigaraki: This new haircut had better look good.

Toga: You’ll love it. It’s kind of a new wave.

Shigaraki: New wave? Like how?

Toga: Well, it’s sort of punk, actually.

Shigaraki: I want a mirror.

Toga: You know what’s all the rage this year? Hats.

blog.name: isminetadeadyet
blog.title: Is Mineta Dead Yet?
blog.description: Has the godforsaken grape been smashed yet? Find out here as we count down the days until we celebrate with the finest of wine for the sweetest of victories.

summary: Maybe you should make a blog asking if Monoma is dead yet. His relentless, baseless, and overall petty-as-fuck grudge against...
question: Maybe you should make a blog asking if Monoma is dead yet. His relentless, baseless, and overall petty-as-fuck grudge against Class A is FAR more annoying and creepy. Even AIZAWA, one of the TEACHERS, tried to shut him up. And it DIDN'T TAKE. Fucking tool.
answer: he may be over-the-top and petty to some degree, but he’s definitely on no mineta level of annoying or creepy. if you wanna make that blog, then go ahead. but i actually like monoma because he’s an interesting character when you look at his strengths and his flaws, and how they actually connect to the way he behaves with class1a. he’s a 3d character if you actually take the time to look at the evidence.

reblog.comment: he may be over-the-top and petty to some degree, but he’s definitely on no mineta level of annoying or creepy. if you wanna make that blog, then go ahead. but i actually like monoma because he’s an interesting character when you look at his strengths and his flaws, and how they actually connect to the way he behaves with class1a. he’s a 3d character if you actually take the time to look at the evidence.

trail.content_raw: he may be over-the-top and petty to some degree, but he’s definitely on no mineta level of annoying or creepy. if you wanna make that blog, then go ahead. but i actually like monoma because he’s an interesting character when you look at his strengths and his flaws, and how they actually connect to the way he behaves with class1a. he’s a 3d character if you actually take the time to look at the evidence.
trail.content: he may be over-the-top and petty to some degree, but he’s definitely on no mineta level of annoying or creepy. if you wanna make that blog, then go ahead. but i actually like monoma because he’s an interesting character when you look at his strengths and his flaws, and how they actually connect to the way he behaves with class1a. he’s a 3d character if you actually take the time to look at the evidence.

blog.name: queenri0t
blog.title: Probably Writting Or Not
blog.description:
Welcome to our cult

———

Banner art belongs to @Huffie-Artist

Rules: Don’t be a Bitch // Masterlist // I write alot of Kirishima Beware!!! // My Insta: @queenri0t

body:
New Student 2

Oof since you guys liked the first part here’s the second parts

Idk if you guys want a 3 but let me know if you do

‘RING’

“Ahh miss Y/n late I see.”

You sighed and looked down. You had to admit you loved your second hour teacher but sometimes he can a real annoying asshole but you dealt with it so why fuss over it.

“Sorry I was…busy.” You said your voice jestering to the blonde foreign hottie standing next to you.

“She’s late because of me I’m new.” He said and your teacher looked at him and he raised his eyebrows.

“Uh huh…so where you from?” Your teacher asked and you sighed excusing yourself to sit in your seat which was in the back of the class.

“Japan.”

“Oooooo japan very exciting so what brings you out here?” He asked and you took out your things and started to work. Honestly first you had the girls starting at him like meat then you have your teachers all fawning over him? God just kill you now.

“My mom is a fashion designer and she got a new job out here so we moved.” He said plainly and everyone awed at him. You did the same your mouth hung open and you watch him.

‘Why the fuck is he out here then?! Shouldn’t he be in some rich private school!?!’

“Ah I see and may I ask why you chose this school?”

“Didn’t want to be treated special.”

Oh well that answers that. But wait from the looks of it he seems like a over confident guy. Maybe a selfish brat if you had to think about it.

“Well you can sit next to y/n she can help you with our lesson she’s really good in government one of my favorite student in fact.”

Oh great don’t send him over here. You huffed and watch him make his way over next to you and you rolled your eyes.

“Nice rich ass.” You said and he pulled his bag off and sat down.

“You’re one to talk teacher’s pet.” You stopped and your mouth opens again and look at him which he smirked.

‘Oh I see he wants to play this game.’

With the rest of class just being a boring old video you yawned and rested your face on your hand. Just five more minutes then class would be over.

The blonde next to you seemed to think the same thing because next thing you know he raised his hand.

“Excuse me but Y/n has to take me to my next class may she leave early.”

Your teacher stopped the video and looked over at you and your raised your head and looked at him.

‘The fuck are you doing!?!’

“Oh well if she’s your guide then yes you both may leave.”

Your jaw dropped and you saw him smirk at you like he just won a race. You didn’t say anything but packed your stuff and walked out of the class with him.

“Could feel you were dying to get out.” He said and you shook your head.

“We had five minutes left plus our next class isn’t that far.”

“What is it?”

You rolled your eyes feeling your snarky self return again.

“I don’t know rich boy why don’t you look at your paper.” You sassed and you saw him look at you and he rolled his own eyes.

“Wow sassy much.”

“Only to people who like the cheat their way out of class.” You said and skipped forward knowing you won this battle. You heard the paper rustle in his hand and he hummed

“Gym?”

You stopped and looked back at him and raised your eyebrow.

“Yep let’s hurry and get your a uniform before anything else.” You said and he smirked

“So I get to play rough with ya huh?” He said and you laughed.

‘Wow if only he knew.’

You smirked and looked back at him and he looked at you “Not quite exactly but I can definitely tell that next hour is going to be fun.” You said and the man furrowed his eyebrows.

Next hour was physical training and you’re going to love watching him kill himself in this desert dry heat.

—-

You set your stuff down in the gym office and the coach walks by you and gives you the clipboard of all the students names. You smiled and started to check down some of the kids you saw walk in and looked at their grades for the class.

You sighed, honestly you wonder how dumb kids have to be to get an F in Physical Training. It’s so easy even you could do it.

“Can I help you?” You coach spoke and you looked up and saw the blonde teenager in the walkway of the office.

“I need a uniform I’m new.” He said and your coach looks at you and you nodded. Agreeing that he wasn’t lying and he was actually new.

“Alright Y/n can get you situated once you’re done come out to the gym we’re playing volleyball.” He said and walked out and blew his whistle.

Sooner or later all the kids in your class started to run out and follow him to the gym room.

The blonde kid looked at you and you rolled your eyes and stood up to head to the back.

“Size?” You asked and he hummed and you looked back him waiting for his answer.

“Large.” He spoke and you nodded and grabbed a large shirt and shorts before you grabbed a black marker.

“Alright so Katsuki Bakugo right?” You said bad he nodded

“So you do know my name? I was starting to wonder when you’ll use it.”

You scoffed and tossed him his shirt “I saw it on your schedule sheet.” You said plainly and looked at him.

“Well get changed and we’ll find you a locker later.” You told him and the blonde shrugged his shoulders and then started to take off his shirt and you squeaked and covered your face and looked to the side.

“W-What are you doing!?!”

Bakugo smirked and took off his shirt “Getting changed. Why you getting all hot headed?” He teased and you growled. Honestly this guy can be a real asshole and you just meet him.

“Well not in here you dick go change somewhere else!” You said and Bakugo laughed before he walked out of the room.

“Alright Miss tour guide whatever you say.”

You huffed and grabbed your clipboard and pen before pulling your hair back into a low ponytail. You sighed and looked at yourself in the mirror they had in the office.

Leggings and a white nationals t-shirt, perfect you looked cute if you had to say yourself. You always were one to wear sports clothes. They were comfortable and when your coach asks you to join them on the activity it was easy for you not to worry about your outfit.

You hummed and grabbed your things and you saw Bakugo waiting for you outside the office. He was leaning against the wall and his eyes were close until you walked past him and he opened one of them to follow you.

“Alright so we’re playing volleyball match style so you’ll probably be put in a small team and depending on what coach does he’ll probably put me with you to make it even.” You spoke and opened the door to the gym.

“So you’ll be playing on a team with me? With the guys?” He asked his time holding somewhat of a ‘are you serious’ hint to it. You rolled your eyes.

“Yeah? Coach normally lets me play with the guys. Why, don’t think a girl can do it?”

Bakugo snort “No it’s just unexpected I mean I bet they crush you at the sport so no need to worry about that.” He laughed and you smirked

“Don’t be so quick to judge Katsuki you might get cold foot here. Just keep in mind that you’re in our school. We play things a little different then in Japan.” You sassed back and Bakugo whistled. Damn you were feisty and quick witted. Bakugo smirked and watch you walk over to your coach and he had to chuckled to himself.

You were definitely different then all these other foreigners here and he was starting to like it.

CONTINUE?

blog.title: Is This Your Card?
blog.description:

• MATCH UPS : CLOSED•

Rules

•MASTERLIST SOON•

JUST SAY #NEXTROUND

Hey I'm Savvy and I can satisfy your need from bands to anime all the way to superheroes!

summary:
BNHA : Poly!Bakugou & Kirishima 
Being in a poly relationship with Bakugou & Kirishima would include: 
Usually it’s the same...
body:
BNHA : Poly!Bakugou & Kirishima

Being in a poly relationship with Bakugou & Kirishima would include:

Usually it’s the same when you read these : Kiri and Bakugou feel in love with you and you must pick?

Nah!

  • “I think Bakugou is cheating on you.” “What?” “Yeah I saw him kissing-”
  • “Kissing who?!” “Kirishima.” “Oh my god!-Wait- it’s okay.”
  • You sitting in the middle or while in the car and Bakugou is driving you sit in the front then you switch with Kirishima.
  • “Sorry sirs, couples only.” “We are a couple.”
  • “Okay pick one.” “Go ahead.” “Okay,” You said.
  • Pointing in Bakugou direction with one hand and another in Kirishima.
  • Kirishima is great at comforting and loves PDA.
  • Bakugou not so much.
  • But he’s so great at protecting.
  • But given one idiot that hurts you.
  • They gonna have trouble.
  • Make it double.

　　　　　 ̶»̶ ̶̶̶ ̶ ̶ ̶̶̶ ̶»̶«̶ ̶̶̶ ̶ ̶ ̶̶̶ ̶«̶ ̶̶̶ ̶　　　　　　

Sorry if it’s SHORT!!
